name: Fly sky high! Set yourself free :D
description: The Luzern area is central to Switzerland, which is central to Europe, and there is nothing like its natural beauty! Of all the ways to immerse yourself in Nature, paragliding is intense, serene and simple, playing with natural forces such as gravity -- no fuel! Just imagine the feeling and experience, not to mention the fresh air and freedom of the sky! :D Whether as a special experience, to highlight a celebration, or perhaps the spark of a new passion, paragliding is a unique experience. This particular package supports a local paragliding family and people who live and love paragliding year round and worldwide. Thanks very much to Freeminds.ch for 'freemindedness' and sharing! :)
